// TermsAndConditions.jsx import React from "react"; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

Terms and Conditions of Use

1. Introduction These Terms of Use (the "Terms") regulate your use of STOQ (hereinafter referred to as the "App"). Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the App. By using the App, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with them, you should not use the App. 2. Usage Rights The App is provided to you under a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to be used in accordance with these Terms. You may not: • copy, modify, or create derivative products based on the App. • transfer, sell, lease, or otherwise distribute the App. • use the App for illegal purposes or in ways that violate these Terms. 3. Registration and account To access the App's features, you will need to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration and maintain the security of your account. You are responsible for all actions performed under your account. 4. Payments and subscriptions If the App offers paid services or subscriptions, you agree to pay all fees according to the rates specified in the App. Payment is made using your chosen payment method. Subscriptions are automatically renewed if you do not cancel them before the end of the current period. 5. Responsibility The app is provided "as is". We do not guarantee that the App will run smoothly or without errors. We are not responsible for any loss or damage resulting from the use or inability to use the App. 6. Changes and updates We reserve the right to change or update the App and these Terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via the App or by email. Continuing to use the App after changes are made means that you agree to the new Terms and Conditions. 7. Discontinuation of use We may suspend or terminate your access to the App if you violate these Terms. You can also stop using the App at any time by deleting your account. 8. Applicable law These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of your country/region. Any disputes related to the use of the App will be resolved in the courts of the relevant jurisdiction. 9. Contact us If you have any questions or comments about these Terms, please contact us at: contact@stoq.ai.

2. Privacy Policy

By accessing our website, you agree to follow all applicable laws, respect intellectual property rights…

{/* Repeat for all 4 sections (your docs) */}

4. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these terms, contact us at support@stoq.com.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
